title: We've answered this so many times How to help our brothers sisters in G*za P*lestine assim al hakeem
transcript: I I want to ask you about how can we help our brothers and sisters in Gaza in Palestine we have answered this a so many times and we said that as individuals individuals we have no ability to do anything for them except a lot and a lot and a lot of Dua in our daily lives in our t in our F prayers we do a lot of Dua also we expose the enemies of Islam and the enemies of Humanity on all social media platforms possible so that they we would expose their inhumanity to the whole world not only in that country but also those Hypocrites who assist them and they say that we are against civilians being killed yet we ship them the bombs ourselves also if there is a possibility of supporting their cause and plight by sending them Aid by sending them food by sending them medicine we should do our level best and may Allah Asel make them uh Prevail and succeed over their enemies
